entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:19 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
